name: Observability
description: Structured logging, distributed tracing, and error budgets for system monitoring and debugging.

prd.problemStatement: Production systems require comprehensive observability to debug issues, monitor performance, and maintain reliability. Structured logging and tracing enable rapid problem resolution.
userStories: As a developer, I want structured logs so that I can debug production issues
As an SRE, I want distributed tracing so that I can identify performance bottlenecks
